TopicTitle: What next? Suggest some mission ideas!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I've recently completed my first manned mission to Duna (with return), and I'm wondering what to do next!

I found that travelling to Duna took a massive amount of (real) time, which was a bit painful, but I think I've done pretty much everything around Kerbin (and moons).

I'm confident I could do a manned mission to Laythe, but it'd be pretty much exactly the same mission as my Duna mission, just with slightly bigger rockets.

Any ideas?

(Grand tour would take too long)
Try to 'land' on Jool. It won't accomplish anything, but the first time I did it, I fell about laughing after Jeb flailed about on the surface for a while before evaporating in a poof of smoke

Build atmospheric probes with scientific instruments and parachutes and send them to any planet with an atmosphere

Do a manned landing on Gilly (not Eve)

Manned landing on Ike

I've put probes on Eve, Duna, Dres and Laythe, (thought not in this save).

Maybe you're right, Richy, and I should put probes on every body!
Get ISA Mapsat and start mapping the solar system looking for "artefacts".
